section.name: Where to find language files
section.p: You can find all current language files here:
Just take one file and translate it to your language.

section.name: Import and export of Language Files

ul.li: with the LanguageEditor you can import and export Language Files

section.name: How to add it as installation option
section.p: Once you have finished the translation you can add a new node to: http://openmeetings.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/singlewebapp/WebContent/languages/languages.xml
the name of the language should match the name of the file. Once this is done the Language file will automatically be imported during installation and will be an option at login.
